title: Documentation update suggestion for External Tools winscp
author: RolfWojtech
body_snippet:
This isn't really a bug, more of a documentation oversight:

I have setup winscp as an external tool as outlined in https://mremoteng.readthedocs.io/en/latest/external_tools_cheat_sheet.html#id1

I tried to use a winscp to a machine with a non-standard SSH port and a password that happens to include an exclamation mark.

First part of the documentation error is that the suggested string omits the port:
`scp://%Username%:%Password%@%Hostname%/`
correct use of the port would be:
`scp://%U...
